format: A data frame with 753 rows and 8 variables
reference: This data set is a lightly edited version of the one found in the carData package in R. It is used in the Describing Relationships chapter of The Effect.
title: U.S. Women's Labor-Force Participation
description:
Description
The Mroz data frame has 753 rows and 8 columns. The observations, from the Panel Study of Income Dynamics (PSID), are married women.

parameters.k618: Number of children 6 to 17 years old
parameters.k5: Number of children 5 years old or younger
parameters.inc: Family income exclusive of wife's income
parameters.lwg: Log expected wage rate. For women in the labor force, the actual wage rate; for women not in the labor force, an imputed value based on the regression of lwg on the other variables.
